description: Contains information on how a pluripotent cell is differentiated to a desired cell type or organoid.
title: differentiation_process

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

differentiation_protocol.description: Unique identifier of the protocol file which captures the details of how differentiation of cells were performed.
differentiation_protocol.example: Abcam- Human embryonic stem cells to hepatic endoderm protocol

differentiation_method.decription: Differentiation method applied to stem cell culture to induce a specific differentiation response.

differentiation_cell_source_id.description: Unique identifier of the cell source prior to differentiation to target cell.

differentiation_cell_source_type.description: Cell type of sample prior to differentiation to target cell.
differentiation_cell_source_type.example: hESC, iPSC, Mesoderm Progenitor, Neural Progenitor

differentiation_target_cell_type.description: Target cell type that cell of origin is differentiated to.

differentiation_target_cell_yield.description: Percent of target cells obtained after directed differentiation of origin cell.

differentiation_growth_environment.description: Growth environment in which stem cells are differentiated.
differentiation_growth_environment.example: scaffold, monolayer, suspension, hanging drops, collagen, engraftment

differentiation_growth_factors.description: Growth factor added to stem cell culture to induce a specific differentiation response.
differentiation_growth_factors.example: FLT3 Ligand CTS Recombinant Human Protein

differentiation_medium.description: Culture media used to induce a specific differentiation response.
differentiation_medium.example: RPMI 1640 + B27, Neurobasal Media, StemPro-34 Serum-Free Medium

differentiation_small_molecules.description: Differentiation small molecules added to stem cell medium to induce a specific differentiation response.
differentiation_small_molecules.example: Retinoic Acid, CHIR99021 (GSK-inhibitor), Activin A, BMP4

differentiation_reagents.description: Differentiation reagents added to stem cell culture to induce a specific differentiation response.
differentiation_reagents.example: Ascl1 (mouse), nuclear receptor subfamily 4 group A member 2(Nurr1), Lmx1a(mouse)

differentiation_cell_culture_id.description: Unique identifier of the differentiated cell culture after differentiation reagents and methods are applied.

differentiation_target_pathway.description: Targeted pathway for specific differentiation response.

differentiation_validation_method.description: Method used to validate origin cell successfully differentiated to target cell.
differentiation_validation_method.example: Pancreatic Cell DTZ Detection Assay, qPCR, Flow Cytometry, Immunocytochemistry Staining

differentiation_validation_results.description: Results confirming successful differentiation to target cell type.
differentiation_validation_results.example: CD103 Positive, Nestin Positive, HCN4 Positive, CD11C Negative

differentiation_extracellular_substrate_.description: Extracellular substrate matrix in which cells are grown during differentiation.
